name: dizzysnake
description:
this is a game, where you can play as a snake and eat the apples, for the playdate!

you can adjust the snake's speed, starting length, and size in the menu, as you can see here.  NOTE: the new values take effect only when the snake restarts.


you can have fun making the snake really big:

you can also invert the display to go white on black, by pressing A.  pressing A again will switch back.  you can also press B to make your snake dizzy, which i guess is hard mode.  pressing B again will stop the dizziness, phew!

the snake can also be super tiny, and apples are a bit hard to see in that case, but they are there!

there is currently no scoring system, but i think it may eventually happen.  the game is open source: https://github.com/lowagner/monochrome-z, see "dizzysnake" folder.
